verses.name: Leviticus 26:5
verses.text: And your threshing shall reach unto the vintage, and the vintage shall reach unto the sowing time: and ye shall eat your bread to the full, and dwell in your land safely.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:6
verses.text: And I will give peace in the land, and ye shall lie down, and none shall make you afraid: and I will rid evil beasts out of the land, neither shall the sword go through your land.

verses.name: Leviticus 26:7
verses.text: And ye shall chase your enemies, and they shall fall before you by the sword.
